name: Travian Bot
short_description:
Travian bot is a software coded in Python programming language. The Chief aim of this project is to automate repeated tasks in the travian game. Making the bot undetectable has been the primary objective. There's no point in developing a game hack if it could potentially lead to your account getting banned.

The software uses sockets for web communication and randomises the user agent everytime. It also has built-in support for handling proxies. Proxies are very important if you wish to manage multiple accounts.

To download the binary please visit http://www.mytravianbot.com/
summary: Travian automation software that can automate repetitive tasks.
